snippet: Citigroup said on Thursday that Franz B. Humer, the chairman of the Swiss pharmaceutical giant Roche Holdings, and Joan E. Spero, a former president of the Doris Duke Charitable Foundation, had been nominated to its board.
abstract: Citigroup said on Thursday that Franz B. Humer, the chairman of the Swiss pharmaceutical giant Roche Holdings, and Joan E. Spero, a former president of the Doris Duke Charitable Foundation, had been nominated to its board.
